title: Technology-Pedagogical Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment and smartphone-integrated learning design for pre-service teachers specializing in language education.

learning_goals: Pre-service teachers can suggest at least three technology-enhanced lesson designs for language subjects.
Pre-service teachers can apply digital resource integration strategies to enhance learner engagement in actual lesson scenarios.
Pre-service teachers can continuously improve their technological-pedagogical competencies through peer feedback and self-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
